resources.string:
Thank you for using TreeMap by Siddharth P Bharadwaj.
To use this app, please grant all the required permissions.
Click \'Input data for my location\' to pinpoint your current location and input data.

Enter the data:
Object name (Title)
Details (Information)
Click on the Photo icon to upload a Photo from your phone or take a photo from the camera. Then click on \'Save\' to save the Information
Click on \'List in this location\' to list nearby objects in your location.
Click on a list item to edit the data.

Changelog:
1.0 - Initial Release
1.1 - Bug fixes, Live Coordinates display and Menu items
1.2 - Optimizations
1.3 - Added Nearby Objects List
1.35 - Fixed a bug where the data was not showing without saving.
1.4 - Added Nearby objects accuracy.
1.5 - Changed styling.
1.6 - Added data editing.
1.7 - Migrated codebase to Kotlin and fixed minor bugs.
